column1: You may get Lyme disease when you are bitten by a tick that has been infected with the germ (bacteria) that causes Lyme disease.
The disease can cause symptoms including bull's eye rash, chills, fever, headache, fatigue, and muscle pain.
Will these symptoms get better if I am treated with antibiotics?
